text: (napiye!) Um'maic ciraippatuttavo allatu um'maik kolai ceyyavo allatu um'mai (uraivittu) appurappatuttavo nirakarippavarkal culcci ceytukontirunta (nerat)tai ninaittup parppiraka. Avarkalum culcci ceytu kontiruntanar; (avarkaluk ketiraka) allahvum culcci ceytu kontiruntan. Anal, culcci ceypavarkalilellam allah mika melanavan
